alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:38PM CDT until May 27 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX...CENTRAL GOSHEN AND SOUTHEASTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 538 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Jay Em to Lingle to 9 miles east of Slater, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lingle, Fort Laramie, Yoder, Veteran, Slater and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
